archimate:Driver.documentation:
In May 2015, the Anglian Water Management Board approved an Information Charter detailing the commitments we will make to help the Anglian Water community feel empowered to think and work differently. Fundamentally, the Information Charter recognises that good quality, easy to access information makes it easier for people to do a great job.
The Information Charter recognises that having the right information at your fingertips is a powerful catalyst, not only in improving efficiency and decision-making but in driving innovation, collaboration and transformation.
